description: The UDLD-state of port has changed. Notify the user by
raising the Trap. Notify the Management Entity the previous

event.Summary: UDLD state has changed from $v2 to $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALCATEL-IND1-UDLD-MIB::udldStateChange ALCATEL-IND1-UDLD-MIB::alaUdldPortIfIndex i 9999 ALCATEL-IND1-UDLD-MIB::alaUdldPrevState i 0 ALCATEL-IND1-UDLD-MIB::alaUdldCurrentState i 0

description: The ifindex of the port on which UDLD trap is raised
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-UDLD-MIB::alaUdldPortIfIndex

description: The previous UDLD state of the Port.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-UDLD-MIB::alaUdldPrevState

description: The current UDLD state of the Port.
